body: "Don't let your cousin Сергей make the щи they said" "just do it yourself they said" one bowl of щи later i understood why they said that, I also understood why the previously half full stoli bottle was empty.

@digilover
It says "sole male/female", not "solo", meaning, there is only a single male/female in this doujin, at least that is what I make of it.
Why is "solo male" and "solo female" in the tags. there isn't a single masturbation scene.
